contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Barou-en-Auge}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Barou-en-Auge |image = Maison dite La Tarenne.JPG |caption = Half-timbered house |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = Morteaux-CoulibÅ“uf |INSEE = 14043 |postal code = 14620 |mayor = Claude Laurent |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Pays de Falaise |longitude = -0.0431 |latitude = 48.9331 |elevation m = 66 |elevation min m = 49 |elevation max m = 116 |area km2 = 8.35 |population = 91 |population date = 2008 }} '''Barou en Auge''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1962|104 |1968|100 |1975|87 |1982|84 |1990|72 |1999|69 |2008|91 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Calvados communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Barouenauge}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
